OOC: heh, Soulstice, can you be more specific as to what Klant is 
shooting? =)

--- Astroblast ---

Astroblast, this time prepared for the shots, lauches himself 
backwards, avoiding the charge, and Klant's shot. "More Maximals 
to slag, they just keep coming for the heap!" He yells mockingly, 
"DIE!" Astroblast fires twice from his Ionic Displacer rifle at Klant 
and and twice and at Torca.


On 15 May 2001, at 15:05, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::Torca/Orion/Hun-Grr:::
> 
> Torca: That was me Decepticon. And there's more where that came from!
> ::He fires another charge at Astroblast:: ~~~~~ ::Hun-grr moves out of
> the way, and 1 missle hits Orion.  Orion takes his sword out and
> attempts to slash Rippersnapper::
>
